com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation

Class CustomerDaoWithJdbc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation.CustomerDaoWithJdbc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDao

    public class CustomerDaoWithJdbc
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDao
    Created by joker on 2017.05.10..

    CustomerDaoWithJdbc class!

    The CustomerDaoWithJdbc class implements the CustomerDao interface. Singleton class, can be created only one instance. You can do some database action: add new customer to database, find a customer by an id find a customer by phone number.

      Default constructor.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Customer customer)
      The add method saves the customer data (name, email, phone number, billing and shipping address) to database.
      Customer find(int id)
      The find method is searching in customers table and returns the customer with the given id.
      int findByPhoneNumber(int phoneNumber)
      The findByPhoneNumber method is searching in customers table and returns the customer's id with the given phoneNumber.
      static CustomerDaoWithJdbc getInstance()
      This constructor prevents any other class from instantiating.

      • getInstance

        public static CustomerDaoWithJdbc getInstance()
        This constructor prevents any other class from instantiating.
        Returns:
        CustomerDaoWithJdbc instance (singleton).

      • add

        public void add(Customer customer)
        The add method saves the customer data (name, email, phone number, billing and shipping address) to database. Catch SQLException if DB connection is failed. PreparedStatement class is help to prevent SQL injection.
        Specified by:
        add in interface CustomerDao
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer instance to save data to database.

      • find

        public Customer find(int id)
        The find method is searching in customers table and returns the customer with the given id. Catch SQLException if DB connection or query fails.
        Specified by:
        find in interface CustomerDao
        Parameters:
        id - The id of customer to find in database.
        Returns:
        customer instance.

      • findByPhoneNumber

        public int findByPhoneNumber(int phoneNumber)
        The findByPhoneNumber method is searching in customers table and returns the customer's id with the given phoneNumber. Catch SQLException if DB connection or query fails.
        Specified by:
        findByPhoneNumber in interface CustomerDao
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer to find in database.
        Returns:
        id of the Customer.
